name: HMI Faceplates and Context Menus
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(HMI Faceplates and Context Menus:<*Eval([IF]([EQ](<*VALUE(Implementation Methodology)*>,)){((0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_sf)*>+ 0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_mf)*>+ 0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_cf)*>+ 0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_vcf)*>+ 0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_rf)*>)*6)+0<*VALUE(Number of Custom Context Menus)*>*8}{(((0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_sf)*> + 0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_mf)*>+ 0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_cf)*>+ 0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_vcf)*> + 0<*VALUE(labor_parameter_rf)*>)*6)+0<*VALUE(Number of Custom Context Menus)*>*6)}[ENDIF])*>)*>
description:
If im=non SB then
 Calculated Hrs = ( sf + mf + cf + vcf + rf) * 6 + ccm * 8
Else If ges= none and im=SB then
 calculated Hrs = ( sf + mf + cf + vcf + rf) * 6 + ccm * 6
Else If  ges!=none and im=SB then
calculated Hrs = (( sf + mf + cf + vcf + rf) * 6 + ccm * 6 ) * 1.2
